Identification.LongTitle: Order Authorizing Members of the Canadian Forces to Accept and Wear the United Nations Iran-Iraq Military Observer Group (UNIIMOG) Medal

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of National Defence, is pleased hereby to authorize members of the Canadian Forces to accept and wear the United Nations Iran-Iraq Military Observer Group (UNIIMOG) Medal in recognition of honourable service with the United Nations Iran-Iraq Military Observer Group.
